tech_news.description: BMW USA's website already shows the names of the 2027 model lineup, including an M2 xDrive and an M350 performance sedan based on the next-generation 3 Series.

tech_news.title: Porsche responds after Resident Evil fans claim Leon will definitely destroy his Porsche in Resident Evil Requiem - Dexerto
tech_news.description: Porsche’s Resident Evil Requiem collaboration has taken a turn, after fans reacted to the reveal trailer by joking that Leon S. Kennedy would destroy the Cayenne Turbo GT before the game even ends.

tech_news.title: Where have the blade lights gone on the Galaxy Buds 4 Pro? - SamMobile

tech_news.title: Asus and Dell announce new mini PCs for Windows 365 - Notebookcheck
tech_news.description: Dell and Asus have announced new mini PCs intended for use with Windows 365. These systems will not power themselves, but will simply allow users to operate Windows running in the cloud.

tech_news.title: It's time for Nintendo to free the RPG geniuses at Camelot from Mario sports games - AV Club
tech_news.description: The designers behind some of the best RPGs ever made have spent almost 30 years primarily making Mario sports games. That's got to stop.
